Hi, I'm Emir. I downloaded Burn Together mod from https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/BurnTogether/releases this link today (I am new to ksp and i could not find an other link).

I placed 2 stock planes (dove) on the runway and made leader 1st and follower 2nd.  Everything was okay until 20m/s when planes pass ~20m/s follower plane started to wobbling left and right. I could take of that follower plane at second try but it was still wobbling in the air and it couldn't catch up me. I tried to change some values over burn together module but nothing changed (I could not figure out what damping is and what it does). I maxed out damping but it is too slow to keep up with me. Is this a bug or mod is trash? Can anybody help me please ?

I'm using 1.12.0.3140 version.

The mods i got that i thought Burn Together might need (maybe not) : Physics Range Extender, Firespitter.

Edited August 8, 2022 by nOtelite

Looking for something like this myself. BurnTogether appears to have been discontinued, last updated for KSP v1.4. Does anyone know of a mod like this that works for v1.12.3?

Or, for that matter, a recent fork of kRPC?

Such a shame, all these amazing mods dropping off. Let's hope KSP2 continues to do the modding thing well.
